{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3328534,"name":"Emil","username":"GronkBaby","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/ba8739/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-09T16:27:48.438Z","cooked":"

Hi everyone.
I’ve been experimenting with our Limelights trying to get automatic intaking and automatic speaker-alignment. However, when I make commands or link certain subsystems to the limelights, it takes about 10-15 seconds after enabling before I can run the commands successfully.

For example, when I put my Limelight3 class into the constructor of my swerve, it won’t run the teleop-swerve command for the first 15 seconds after enabling.

Has anyone experienced this before?

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2024-03-09T16:27:48.438Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":14,"reads":50,"readers_count":49,"score":80.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":458028,"topic_slug":"any-commands-involving-limelight-take-around-15-seconds-after-enabling-before-it-starts-running","display_username":"Emil","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64351,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/any-commands-involving-limelight-take-around-15-seconds-after-enabling-before-it-starts-running/458028/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3328545,"name":"Basel Alghanem","username":"Basel_A","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/basel_a/{size}/65204_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-09T16:49:35.701Z","cooked":"

Can you add some prints to tell where the hangup is? If you’re using json results, then that takes a few seconds to initialize on the first call, so you should make sure to do that in disabled init. But doesn’t take 15 seconds.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2024-03-09T16:49:35.701Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":45,"readers_count":44,"score":24.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":458028,"topic_slug":"any-commands-involving-limelight-take-around-15-seconds-after-enabling-before-it-starts-running","display_username":"Basel Alghanem","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":12479,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/any-commands-involving-limelight-take-around-15-seconds-after-enabling-before-it-starts-running/458028/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3328550,"name":"Emil","username":"GronkBaby","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/ba8739/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-09T16:55:44.623Z","cooked":"

Does LimelightHelpers count as json? I’m pretty sure they parse through JSON results, so I’m pretty sure that counts…

Are you suggesting I put in the constructor of the Limelight class to call the json to get it to initialize?

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2024-03-09T16:55:44.623Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":43,"readers_count":42,"score":23.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":458028,"topic_slug":"any-commands-involving-limelight-take-around-15-seconds-after-enabling-before-it-starts-running","display_username":"Emil","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":12479,"username":"Basel_A","name":"Basel Alghanem","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/basel_a/{size}/65204_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64351,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/any-commands-involving-limelight-take-around-15-seconds-after-enabling-before-it-starts-running/458028/3","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3328577,"name":"Basel Alghanem","username":"Basel_A","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/basel_a/{size}/65204_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-09T17:52:09.935Z","cooked":"

Anything that does getLatestResults invokes the json parsing, and you should try to minimize the number of times you call that.

Constructor is probably fine but we do it in disabledInit which is slightly later 2024-crescendo/src/main/java/frc/robot/Robot.java at ec84119043c4242204931ca22e36ba15642d486a · cachemoney8096/2024-crescendo · GitHub
